BackstoryDef.title: acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Within the inner sanctums of the starless, [PAWN_nameDef] became a devout practitioner of the dark rituals.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] knows the intricacies of these ceremonies and has a deeper connection with the mystical.

BackstoryDef.title: astronomer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fascination with celestial mysteries made [PAWN_objective] join the starless astronomers\n\n[PAWN_possessive] responsibilities included monitoring cosmic events, predicting eclipses, and advising leaders on auspicious times for rituals and raids, granting [PAWN_nameDef] respect but also burdening [PAWN_objective] with the heavy responsibility of foreseeing the faction's fate in the vast expanse of space.

BackstoryDef.title: brawler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The masters saw potential in [PAWN_nameDef] to serve as a formidable melee fighter.\n\nAfter being subjected to grueling training as a melee fighter, [PAWN_pronoun] remained determined to seize whatever moments of life's pleasures and freedom [PAWN_pronoun] could before [PAWN_possessive] inevitable demise.

BackstoryDef.title: butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took on the grisly role of ensuring that the larders of the masters remained well stocked.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] approached [PAWN_possessive] duties with unwavering dedication, taking a liking to the macabre dishes favored by the masters.

BackstoryDef.title: drainer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the delicate art of hemogen harvesting, extracting the life force from cattle without causing permanent harm.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] work also included the maintenance of the facility, and stopping escape attempts.

BackstoryDef.title: enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] held a position of authority, tasked with maintaining order among the thralls and cattle.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] had a reputation for ruthlessly cracking down on any signs of disobedience, all in the name of serving the masters.

BackstoryDef.title: healer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had to ensure that thralls remained healthy and productive, using [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of medicine to maintain their workforce.\n\n [PAWN_pronoun] also held the grim responsibility of determining which thralls were deemed useless and thus destined for a darker fate.

BackstoryDef.title: hound
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tasked with tracking down and capturing those who tried to escape the starless masters, [PAWN_nameDef] has developed an uncanny ability to locate fugitives in distant worlds or even in the vastness of space.

BackstoryDef.title: hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] employed cunning tactics to ensure captives were taken alive.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] used them not only for information but also as bait to lure additional prey into the starless grasp.

BackstoryDef.title: pet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was subjected to a dehumanizing role as the personal plaything of one of the overlords.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] training focused on ensuring unwavering compliance with every one of [PAWN_possessive] master's whims, leaving [PAWN_objective] trapped in a life of servitude and humiliation.

BackstoryDef.title: proselytizer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in techniques to influence captives, making them more compliant to the demands of the masters.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] possesses deep knowledge of psychological manipulation techniques.

BackstoryDef.title: prospector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] undertook the daunting task of exploring the desolate and frigid asteroid wastelands surrounding a distant star.\n\nDespite the harsh conditions, [PAWN_pronoun] managed not only to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] duties but also to turn a small profit on the side.

BackstoryDef.title: scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with venturing near one of the treacherous stars to find suitable raid targets.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] developed keen survival skills and knowledge of the dangers of this rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: scholar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Driven by a thirst for knowledge, [PAWN_nameDef] immersed [PAWN_objective]self in the study of the starless beliefs and rituals.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] has become a repository of the esoteric wisdom of the ancients.

BackstoryDef.title: sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] potential as a skilled marksman was recognized and encouraged by the masters.\n\nIn their service, [PAWN_pronoun] has honed [PAWN_possessive] skills to become a ruthless assassin, tallying dozens of confirmed kills with cold precision.

BackstoryDef.title: taskmaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assumed a critical role in the operation of [PAWN_possessive] master's household, ensuring that it ran with impeccable precision.\n\nThis often entailed the discipline and management of unruly thralls, a responsibility that [PAWN_pronoun] carried out with unwavering efficiency and a degree of satisfaction.
